title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 208.1 - Records available for public inspection and copying
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 208.1 - Records available for public inspection and copying

State Regulations

The records of the board available for public inspection and
copying, in accordance with the procedures hereinafter set forth, are those
described by section
87
of the

Public Officers Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
208.1

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
